ygData.subject: Re: Runed Bone Fork......
ygData.msgSnippet: I find a similar problem with the /who command finding fellow guild members, my guild name is  and when I do a /who all Lords it will show me a
ygData.messageBody:
I find a similar problem with the /who command finding fellow guild
members, my guild name is <Lords of Chaos> and when I do a /who all Lords
it will show me a list of all my guild friends who are on but are not anon.
This is fine, but the problem is when I am in the same zone as fellow guild
members and I do a /who Lords then nothing comes up, why is this??

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 33 Songs - Veeshan
Meklon, Level 6 Dark Elf Cleric of Tunare - Veeshan

Ps, I was made an officer by my guild on Saturday =)





"RaceFace" <bean@...> on 08/01/2000 04:35:39

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......





I've always thought of it as more of a smirk. As in, "I wonder if he
realizes just how dumb a bard looks carrying around a skull on a stick.
Probably not."

-Gaelaian Galaenor, perpetual 22nd level bard who will always refuse to
carry an ugly stick because it's.. well.. ugly.

----- Original Message -----
From: "John Tatsukawa" <jht@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: January 7, 2000 18:32
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork......


> Gak! I was just copying what was from the previous email. Just too busy
to
> keep up on the list and "proofread" previously written email. Oh well.
Now
I
> have to go and apologize to my own Staff of Writhing for the blunder. I
> wonder if he'll still smile at me like he always does. :-)
>
> ---Windleaf
